meanings: (주의를 주다) [명사] warning (of/against), caution, [동사] warn, caution ((sb) against sth), give a warning
give sb a strict[severe, sharp, solemn] warning

vlive.korean: 경고에요 경고! That's a warning. A warning! 듣기 View video IU : [IU TV] 장만월에게 물어봐!
학생들 저기 경고문 못 봤어? Hey, didn't you see the sign? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 인서울 안 본 사람도 피식할 유잼포인트 모음 [인서울] - 스페셜 클립
vlive.english: Hey, didn't you see the sign?

vlive.korean: 스포 안 돼요 - 스포하면 어떡해 - 경고! 경고! Don't spoil it.- Don't do spoilers. - Warning, warning! 듣기 View video World Klass (월드 클래스) : ⛹️‍♂️ 굴려라~ 굴려라~ 굴렁쇠즈! ♾

vlive.english: [That was the cutest warning... I want to die! I want to die!]

examples.korean: The referee warned him for dangerous play. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 심판이 난폭 경기를 이유로 그에게 경고를 주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The referee warned him for dangerous play. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The commander had been forewarned of the attack. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 지휘관은 그 공격에 대한 경고를 받았었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The commander had been forewarned of the attack. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Motorists have been warned to beware of icy roads. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 운전자들에게 빙판길을 조심하라는 경고가 있어 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Motorists have been warned to beware of icy roads. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The government has warned of stormy waters ahead. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 정부가 험악한 상황이 앞에 있다고 경고해 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The government has warned of stormy waters ahead. Add to Wordbook
